suppress.notes: Package: braces Uncontrolled resource consumption in braces Suppressed temporarily until node/packages can be properly upgraded.
Package: decode-uri-component Improper Input Validation Vulnerability Leading to Denial of Service Suppressed temporarily until node/packages can be properly upgraded.

Package: form-data Use of Insufficiently Random Values vulnerability in form-data allows HTTP Parameter Pollution (HPP). This vulnerability is associated with program files lib/form_data.Js. This issue affects form-data: < 2.5.4, 3.0.0 - 3.0.3, 4.0.0 - 4.0.3. Suppressed temporarily until node/packages can be properly upgraded.

Package: pbkdf2 Improper Input Validation vulnerability in pbkdf2 allows Signature Spoofing by Improper Validation. This vulnerability is associated with program files lib/to-buffer.Js. This issue affects pbkdf2: from 3.0.10 through 3.1.2. Suppressed temporarily until node/packages can be properly upgraded.

Package: pbkdf2 Improper Input Validation vulnerability in pbkdf2 allows Signature Spoofing by Improper Validation. This vulnerability is associated with program files lib/to-buffer.Js. This issue affects pbkdf2: from 3.0.10 through 3.1.2. Suppressed temporarily until node/packages can be properly upgraded.

Package: sha.js Improper Input Validation vulnerability in sha.js allows Input Data Manipulation.This issue affects sha.js: through 2.4.11. Suppressed temporarily until node/packages can be properly upgraded.

Package: minimatch CVE-2026-26996 / GHSA-3ppc-4f35-3m26 - ReDoS via repeated wildcards. Fix requires minimatch >= 10.2.1 but all dependents (eslint, copy-webpack-plugin, npm-run-all, etc.) are pinned to ^3.x. Dev-only dependency, not used in production. Backport PR for v3 is pending (isaacs/minimatch#277). Suppressed until backport is published or parent packages are upgraded.
